doc:
Stephen Moorer https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stephen_Moorer 0 Stephen Moorer (born September 29, 1961) is a stage actor, director and producer based on the Central California Coast. He founded the only year-round professional theatre in Monterey County, GroveMont Theatre in 1982, renaming the non-profit organization Pacific Repertory Theatre in 1994, when the group acquired the Golden Bough Playhouse in Carmel-by-the-Sea, California. Stephen_Moorer ( born September_29_,_1961 ) is a_stage_actor , director_and_producer based on the_Central_California_Coast . He founded the_only_year-round_professional_theatre in Monterey_County , GroveMont_Theatre in 1982 , renaming the_non-profit_organization_Pacific_Repertory_Theatre in 1994 , when the_group acquired the_Golden_Bough_Playhouse in Carmel-by-the-Sea , California .
